Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> On 12/4/2015, 10:05:53, Caithloki said:
> 
> 
> Wow, so I made this challenge for myself alot more difficult than it needed to be with the two SRB engines on the sides.
> 

I enjoyed your video series and great job.  KER would have solved those SRB choices but as Slashy figures there are only a few permutations due to your engine variety.  TWR for me was the first item I looked at.

Welcome to the clan, Caithloki. Ugh!

Just to let everyone know the Caveman Challenge 1.0.5 will continue on a new thread.  The first thing I need to do is finish the challenge in 1.0.5

My laptop was having thermal issues.  **[I fixed it using a hammer and copper](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/127146-satellite-p300-thermal-solution/#comment-2311495)**

![t5RcJcX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/t5RcJcX.jpg)

I am running another test and if all goes well then it looks as if I will play KSP tomorrow![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D").

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-07T04:30:43Z" title="12/07/2015 04:30  AM" data-short="8 yr">December 7, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

Jetski,

 Congratulations on successfully completing the Caveman Challenge!

Best,

-Slashy

After having a glorious binge on KSP, I completed the Caveman Challenge 1.0.5 today.  The **[album](http://imgur.com/a/MCp3D)** will also be posted in the new KSP Caveman Challenge 1.0.5 thread.

I was trying to figure a way to verify the challenge entrant.  The mission summary or the science archives  indicate what was done to earn the 1188 science and can readily indicate a successful applicant.

Also I am thinking of keeping the original badge.

![caveman_zpsuxvcg0eo.jpg](http://i52.photobucket.com/albums/g13/GoSlash27/KSP/Caveman%20challenge/caveman_zpsuxvcg0eo.jpg)

Hope that I can maintain this challenge properly.  If any other clan member would like to help administrate please let me know.

Many thanks goes to Slashy for creating this awesome challenge.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-08T05:05:05Z" title="12/08/2015 05:05  AM" data-short="8 yr">December 8, 2015</time> by MoeslyArmlis**

Hey I manage to do it !

I managed to loose Val and Jeb while testing my tourism rocket but I dit it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/YAKvb/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

Challenge accepted, attempted, met.  

Majority of my science was obtained through grinding contracts with the reputation to science bonus from Administration. .. A good portion also came from performing science experiments around the <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr> and surrounding biomes (including a very ambitious suborbital launch to the northern ice shelf) and up to high orbit altitudes around kerbin .. I did however admittedly alter the difficulty settings in one respect ... I turned off the additional ground stations on kerbin relating to the CommNet

Hi [@Gadrius](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/179331-gadrius/), welcome to the forums! 

This is a very old thread, the most recent iteration of this challenge is here 

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/161335-13x-ksp-caveman-evolved-challenge/&do=embed"></iframe>

I suspect you will get more answers there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Congratulations on completing the challange!
